text: Images is a 1972 British psychological horror movie directed by Robert Altman and starring Susannah York, Ren√© Auberjonois, Marcel Bozzuffi and Cathryn Harrison. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1973. Images was released on December 18, 1972. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 horror movies Category:British horror movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:1970s psychological movies Category:Movies about writers Category:Feminist movies Category:1972 thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies about schizophrenia Category:Movies set in country houses Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies about home invasions Category:Movies composed by John Williams
